  • Method Details

    • joinGameLobby

      public java.lang.String joinGameLobby​(javax.websocket.Session user, java.lang.String lobby)
      Sets a user lobby property. Does not work if player already is in a lobby with a game started.
      Parameters:
      user - User
      lobby - Lobby to join
      Returns:
      If successfully changed lobby returns Json String of users new state else returns empty string if failed to join lobby

    • startGame

      public void startGame​(int lobby)
      Starts a game for that lobby
      Parameters:
      lobby - Lobby to start game for

    • moveAction

      public void moveAction​(int playerNr, int dirX, int dirY, int lobby)
      Moves a player in a game
      Parameters:
      playerNr - Players number
      dirX - Direction to move in: 1 = Left, -1 = Right, 0 = No direction
      dirY - Direction to move in: 1 = Down, -1 = Up, 0 = No direction
      lobby - Lobby that the player is in

    • attackAction

      public void attackAction​(int playerNr, int dirX, int dirY, int lobby)
      Issues an attack from a player in a game
      Parameters:
      playerNr - Players number
      dirX - Direction of attack: 1 = Left, -1 = Right, 0 = No direction
      dirY - Direction of attack: 1 = Down, -1 = Up, 0 = No direction
      lobby - Lobby that the player is in

    • getGame

      public Game getGame​(int lobby)
      Get a game from a lobby
      Parameters:
      lobby - Lobby that contains game
      Returns:
      Returns a Game object

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(javax.websocket.Session user)
      Removes a user from GAMES
      Parameters:
      user - User to remove

    • destroyGame

      public void destroyGame​(int lobby)
      Destroys a game and removes its scheduler.
      Parameters:
      lobby - Lobby that contains game

    • creatGame

      public GameHandler creatGame​(int lobby)
      Creates a new game, gameHandler and starts a update scheduler for that gameHandler.
      Parameters:
      lobby - Lobby to create game for
      Returns:
      Returns a new gameHandler for specified lobby
